title: Skeptoid #1027: Radioactive Relics: The Missing RTGs
description:
Radioactive nuclear generators sit out in the environment, posing a real hazard. They're mostly — but not all — in Russia.

Learn about your ad choices: dovetail.prx.org/ad-choices
content:
by Brian DunningFebruary 10, 2026
Sponsor an episode!
The Arctic coast of Russia is about as remote and unforgiving a place as there is. Go east from Norway and youll follow 24,000 kilometers of co… [+12357 chars]
de:
Skeptoid #1027: Radioaktive Relikte: Die fehlenden RTGs. Radioaktive Kerngeneratoren befinden sich in der Umwelt und stellen eine echte Gefahr dar. Sie befinden sich größtenteils – aber nicht alle – in Russland.

Erfahren Sie mehr über Ihre Anzeigenauswahl: dovetail.prx.org/ad-choices
en:
Skeptoid #1027: Radioactive Relics: The Missing RTGs. Radioactive nuclear generators sit out in the environment, posing a real hazard. They're mostly — but not all — in Russia.

Learn about your ad choices: dovetail.prx.org/ad-choices
la:
Skeptoid # 1027: Reliquiae radioactivae: Absentis RTGs. Generatores nuclei radioactivos in ambitu sedent, aleam realem ponentes. Plerumque sunt — sed non omnes — in Russia.

The Avs had a tough schedule coming out of the break, and they stumbled through February with a 5-5… [+6007 chars]
de: Avalanche bleibt in der Pause der Olympischen Winterspiele der Tempomacher der NHL, aber das Team rückt immer näher. Vor zwei Jahren bahnte sich die Colorado Avalanche ihren Weg in die All-Star-Runde und gewann 11 von 14 Spielen.
en: Avalanche still NHL’s pacesetter at Winter Olympics break, but pack is creeping closer. Two years ago the Colorado Avalanche steamrolled its way into the All-Star break, winning 11 of 14 games.
la: Avalanche adhuc NHL passer in Olympia Hiemalia frangunt, sed sarcina propius serpit. Duos annos ante Colorado Avalanche steamrolled suum iter in All-stella intermissum, vincens 11 de 14 ludis.

title: Keeler: Get well at Winter Olympics, Gabriel Landeskog. Avalanche haven’t been same without you.
description: Good luck in Milan Cortina, Gabriel Landeskog. Get healthy. Get nasty. Get right. Because with no captain on the bridge, the Avalanche will sink into the springtime again without a Stanley Cup.
content:
It ain’t me, Gabe. It’s them. The Avalanche without Gabriel Landeskog are a crapshoot. Only the “shoot” part comes and goes in the breeze.
Thump Detroit 5-0 in Motown. Come home and get blanked by t… [+5811 chars]
de: Keeler: Gute Besserung bei den Olympischen Winterspielen, Gabriel Landeskog. Ohne dich wäre Avalanche nicht dasselbe gewesen. Viel Glück in Mailand Cortina, Gabriel Landeskog. Werde gesund. Werde böse. Machen Sie es richtig. Denn ohne Kapitän auf der Brücke wird die Avalanche ohne Stanley Cup wieder im Frühling versinken.
en: Keeler: Get well at Winter Olympics, Gabriel Landeskog. Avalanche haven’t been same without you.. Good luck in Milan Cortina, Gabriel Landeskog. Get healthy. Get nasty. Get right. Because with no captain on the bridge, the Avalanche will sink into the springtime again without a Stanley Cup.
la: Keeler: Bene in Olympia Hiemali Gabriel Landeskog. Avalanche sine te non idem fuit. Bona fortuna Mediolani Cortina, Gabriel Landeskog. Sanus sume. Spurius exi. Accipe dextram. Quia nullo duce pontis, Avalanche in vernum tempus sine Stanleio Cup demergetur.
